Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Binding Target: site 3 of the insect voltage- gated sodium channel (Nav)
Sequence Information.Function: Competes for binding at site 3 of the insect voltage- gated sodium channel (Nav). Insecticidal neurotoxin. Causes temporary paralysis to lepidopteran larvae when injected at 10.3 nmol/g. Is not toxic to mice when injected intracranially at 20 pmol/g.##PTM

Literature.Title: Distinct primary structures of the major peptide toxins from thevenom of the spider Macrothele gigas that bind to sites 3 and 4 in thesodium channel.
Literature.Author: Corzo G., Gilles N., Satake H., Villegas E., Dai L., Nakajima T., Haupt J.
